title: Football - Nikola Jurcevic takes up role as West Ham assistant manager
content:
The 49-year-old former Croatia international appeared at Euro '96 in England as a player and has worked under Bilic with the pair's national team, Lokomotiv Moscow and Besiktas. 

Jurcevic told West Ham's official website: "I am very happy that I can start work at the club. I am very motivated for the future and think we have a good team. I hope we will have a very good season. 

"I am very excited to work in England because I think the Premier League is one of the best in the world. 

Read the full article on eurosport.co.uk: Nikola Jurcevic takes up role as West Ham assistant manager
